content: SPX-H Vacuum-Brazed Diamond Wire (Concrete & Steel) Ultimate diamond wire for high performance cutting in reinforced concrete and pure steel (15-30 kW wire saw) ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond wires, floor saw blades, and wall saw blades- - - ### FEATURES:Features Ultimate diamond wire â€“ extra-fast cutting speed thanks to high-quality, large abrasive diamonds Ultimate life time thanks to double-layer brazed diamond beads and special segment bonding Premium rubber coating to prevent fast wear and increase life time Stable cutting speed Performs best on high-power wire saws Applications Recommended for cutting highly reinforced concrete, pure steel, heat-treated steel, and metal alloys Suitable for medium- to high-power wire sawing machines For intensive, professional use to solve special applications in building construction, demolition and decommissioning ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base material: Concrete, Concrete (reinforced), Steel Segment type: Brazed Wet or dry operation: Wet and Dry Technical Data | Base material | Concrete, Concrete (reinforced), Steel | Segment type | Brazed | Wet or dry operation | Wet and Dry | Bead diameter | 0.4 in | Number of beads per meter | 44 | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2305659 - Diamond wire DS-W 10.5-25m VB SPX-H C&S - Package Size 25 m - 2305658 - Diamond wire DS-W 10.5-50m VB SPX-H C&S - Package Size 50 m - 2305657 - Diamond wire DS-W 10.5-100m VB SPX-H C&S - Package Size 100 m
